mapper.select: SELECT * FROM witness_info WHERE witness_serialNum = #{witnessSerialNum, jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO witness_info ( witness_date, witness_place, witness_gender, witness_age, witness_etc, witness_img, member_serialNum, admin_serialNum, missing_serialNum ) VALUES ( #{date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{place, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{age, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{etc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberSerialNum, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adminSerialNum, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{missingSerialNum, jdbcType=CHAR} )
